When the user attempts to access a bug that doesn't exist, a 404 is
raised.

  >>> print http(r"""
  ... GET http://localhost:8085/bugs/123456 HTTP/1.1
  ... """)
  HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
  ...

  >>> print http(r"""
  ... GET http://localhost:8085/bugs/doesntexist HTTP/1.1
  ... """)
  HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
  ...
